name: Local-Ai-Code
description: A fully local AI coding assistant for Visual Studio Code with project-wide context and guarded command/file execution.

commands.title: Local Ai Coder: Show Last Plan
Local Ai Coder: Add Ollama Model
Local Ai Coder: Run Debug Prompt

ai-code.modelId.description: Primary Ollama model identifier (use the form ollama:model). Defaults to `ollama:qwen2.5-coder:7b` for a strong 7B planner that fits in 16 GB of RAM.

ai-code.collaboratorModelId.description: Secondary Ollama model identifier for the reviewer that refines the primary plan. Defaults to `ollama:deepseek-coder:6.7b`. Clear the value to reuse the planning model.

ai-code.coderModelId.description: Optional Ollama model identifier dedicated to the coding stage. Leave blank to reuse the reviewer model.

ai-code.verifierModelId.description: Dedicated Ollama model identifier for verifying that responses are valid JSON. Defaults to `ollama:phi3:mini`. Clear the value to reuse the collaborator model.

ai-code.promptBuilders.planner.description: Prompt builder identifier for the planning role. Leave blank to use the default comprehensive prompt.

ai-code.promptBuilders.contextScout.description: Prompt builder identifier for the context scout role. Leave blank to match the planner prompt builder.

ai-code.promptBuilders.reviewer.description: Prompt builder identifier for the reviewer role. Leave blank to match the planner prompt builder.

ai-code.promptBuilders.coder.description: Prompt builder identifier for the coding role. Leave blank to inherit from the reviewer prompt builder.

ai-code.promptBuilders.qa.description: Prompt builder identifier for the QA role. Leave blank to match the reviewer prompt builder.

ai-code.promptBuilders.safety.description: Prompt builder identifier for the safety role. Leave blank to match the QA prompt builder.

ai-code.promptBuilders.verifier.description: Prompt builder identifier for the verification role. Leave blank to match the safety prompt builder.

ai-code.collaboration.showLiveStream.description: Stream planner and reviewer updates live while they collaborate on a plan.

ai-code.maxNewTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens the assistant will generate per response.

ai-code.temperature.description: Sampling temperature to control response creativity.

ai-code.temperature.contextScout.description: Override sampling temperature for the context scout role.

ai-code.temperature.planner.description: Override sampling temperature for the planner role.

ai-code.temperature.reviewer.description: Override sampling temperature for the reviewer role.

ai-code.temperature.qa.description: Override sampling temperature for the QA role.

ai-code.temperature.safety.description: Override sampling temperature for the safety auditor role.

ai-code.temperature.verifier.description: Override sampling temperature for the verifier role.

ai-code.context.maxFiles.description: Maximum number of project files to stream into the assistant's context.

ai-code.context.maxFileSize.description: Maximum size (in kilobytes) for any individual file included in the context.
ai-code.context.maxFileSize.markdownDescription: Interpreted as kilobytes. For example, enter `200` for a 200 KB limit. Existing byte-based values are converted automatically.

ai-code.context.maxTotalSize.description: Maximum total size (in kilobytes) of all files combined in the context window.
ai-code.context.maxTotalSize.markdownDescription: Interpreted as kilobytes. For example, enter `1500` for a 1.5 MB combined limit. Existing byte-based values are converted automatically.

ai-code.allowCommandExecution.description: Allow the assistant to suggest shell/Powershell commands that require user approval before execution.

ai-code.shell.description: Shell executable to use for approved commands. Use 'powershell' on Windows to force PowerShell usage.

ai-code.context.includeBinary.description: Allow binary files to be included in the context (not recommended).

ai-code.context.excludeGlobs.description: Additional glob patterns to exclude when collecting context.

ai-code.context.overrideDefaultExcludes.description: If true, ignore the built-in exclude list and rely solely on context.excludeGlobs.

ai-code.context.prioritizeChangedFiles.description: Gather Git changed and staged files before scanning the rest of the workspace.

ai-code.ollama.requestTimeoutMs.description: Timeout in seconds for Ollama REST requests such as /api/pull and /api/show.
ai-code.ollama.requestTimeoutMs.markdownDescription: Interpreted as seconds. Enter `30` for a 30 second timeout. Existing millisecond-based values are converted automatically.

ai-code.ollama.generationTimeoutMs.description: Timeout in seconds for Ollama generation streaming requests.
ai-code.ollama.generationTimeoutMs.markdownDescription: Interpreted as seconds. Enter `120` for a two-minute timeout. Set to `0` or a negative number to disable the timeout. Existing millisecond-based values are converted automatically.

ai-code.sampling.topP.description: Top-p nucleus sampling value forwarded to Ollama generations.

ai-code.sampling.topP.contextScout.description: Override top-p sampling weight for the context scout role.

ai-code.sampling.topP.planner.description: Override top-p sampling weight for the planner role.

ai-code.sampling.topP.reviewer.description: Override top-p sampling weight for the reviewer role.

ai-code.sampling.topP.qa.description: Override top-p sampling weight for the QA role.

ai-code.sampling.topP.safety.description: Override top-p sampling weight for the safety auditor role.

ai-code.sampling.topP.verifier.description: Override top-p sampling weight for the verifier role.

ai-code.sampling.repetitionPenalty.conte.description: Override repetition penalty for the context scout role.

ai-code.sampling.repetitionPenalty.plann.description: Override repetition penalty for the planner role.

ai-code.sampling.repetitionPenalty.revie.description: Override repetition penalty for the reviewer role.

ai-code.sampling.repetitionPenalty.qa.description: Override repetition penalty for the QA role.

ai-code.sampling.repetitionPenalty.safet.description: Override repetition penalty for the safety auditor role.

ai-code.sampling.repetitionPenalty.verif.description: Override repetition penalty for the verifier role.
